Category: Health & Beauty, Make Up, Complexion, Foundations
Product Name: VANI-T Powder Foundation - Truffle
Long Description:
Foundation, concealer and sunscreen in a feather-light powder
A true heavy lifter, the amazing VANI-T Mineral Powder Foundation is a foundation, concealer, powder and chemical free SPF 15+ sunscreen all in one super silky powder. There’s plenty to love about its non-clogging formula, long-lasting coverage and shine-free finish. A flawless look is guaranteed every time thanks to the micro diffusers that diminish fine lines and wrinkles, conceal blemishes and even out skin tone.
This product doesn’t just look gorgeous; it’s also packed full of nourishing mineral ingredients that deliver an instant hydration surge and allow your skin to breathe. The combo of hypoallergenic and anti-ageing goodies make it an ideal pick for anyone who suffers from sensitive skin or breakouts.
This makeup-and-skincare hybrid is infused with broad-spectrum SPF and a water-resistant formula that won’t move, cake or crease. Perfect for long days lounging in the sun. Or sipping Prosecco at the bar. Your choice.
Skin typeGreat for all skin types, all ages and all complexions
How oftenUse daily to camouflage blemishes and rock a sun-kissed glow
SmellLight, aromatic fragrance thanks to its mineral base
Colour12 shades to match all skin tones including (from lightest to darkest):
LIGHT
Shell – cool, pink undertones for fair to light skin tonesBiscuit – warm, yellow undertones for fair skin tonesSheer – cool, pink undertones for light to medium skin tonesBare – warm, yellow undertones for light to medium skin tonesMEDIUM
Truffle – cool, pink undertones for light to medium skin tonesAlmondine – warm, yellow undertones for light to medium skin tonesMocha – neutral, yellow undertones for medium skin tonesNude – warm, yellow undertones for medium skin tonesDARK
Toffee – cool, pink undertones for medium to tan skin tonesSand – warm, yellow undertones for medium to tan skin tonesTan – warm, yellow undertones for tan skin tonesCaramel – warm, yellow undertones for tan to deep skin tonesNeed help colour matching? Send us a makeup free photo of yourself in natural light via email (hello@vani-t.com) or via live chat. One of our beauty pros is standing by!
HERO INGREDIENTSChock full of minerals and natural ingredients to protect and nurture your skin.
100% pure minerals - delivers water and sweat resistance coverage, plus a range of healing and soothing benefitsOlive Squalane - powerful anti-ageing and anti-inflammatory benefits (known as nature’s own facelift!)Zinc Oxide (SPF15+) - provides great coverage, heals and soothes the skin and protects from damaging UV raysMica - provides a natural glow and radianceThe full lineup:
Mica, Zinc Oxide (CI 77947), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Silicon Dioxide (Silica), Vitamin E (Tocopherol), Squalane, Tin Oxide (CI 77861). May Contain (+/-): Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499).
WHY YOU’LL LOVE IT Buildable cover that feels light, natural and lasts all-day - what’s not to love?
12 shades to suit every complexionFantastic, breathable coverageLong-lasting coverTalc-free formula100% nasty-free, cruelty-free and vegan
HOW TO USEStep 1: Prep your skinFor the best possible result, ensure your skin is clean, hydrated and dry.
Step 2: Loosen upTap the jar upside down (with the lid on) to loosen the foundation. Then turn back over and tap the lid again.
Step 3: Swirl and buffUsing a brush, swirl into the powder, tap off excess, and apply to the skin using a circular, buffing motion. A 15g jar should last between 4 - 6 months (depending on application - we’re not here to judge).
Pro tip: Applying your mineral powder foundation with the VANI-T Kabuki Brush will give a flawless finish and a look you’ll love.

Category: Health & Beauty, Make Up, Complexion, Foundations
Product Name: Thin Lizzy Flawless Complexion Liquid Foundation Missy
Long Description: User-friendly liquid foundation, easy blend and build. Lightweight & high coverage for flawless looking skin Liquid foundation brings your skin to life. Our unique liquid-to-powder formulation blurs imperfections like fine lines, minimises the appearance of pores, and evens out skin tone. Plus, it's instantly hydrating and plumps up the skin making it look smooth and fresh all day. Feels soft and weightless, gives you a dewy, flawless finish that lasts. No nasty skin-clogging ingredients like cakey powders or oily moisturisers, only the good stuff. Looks like natural skin, but better. For a seamless application use the specially designed Blurring Brush and Blending Sponge Key Benefits: Our special formulation makes this foundation perfect for special events and flash photography! Say goodbye to flashback Medium to full coverage with a 'light as air' formula to prevent your foundation from caking Lasts all day with minimal touch ups required No animals were harmed in the making of this foundation

Category: Health & Beauty, Make Up, Complexion, Foundations
Product Name: M.A.C Studio Fix Powder Plus Foundation 15g - NW55
Long Description:
Product Description
A one-step powder and foundation that gives skin a smooth and even ultra-matte finish with medium-to-full buildable coverage, with a velvety texture that allows skin to breathe. MAC Studio Fix Powder Plus Foundation is long-wearing, colour-true, non-caking, non-streaking and non-settling – all for 12 hours. This pressed powder foundation is available in MAC's most inclusive range of colours.
Product Highlights:
Powder formula stays matte all day long without looking flat  Shades stay true to colour and don’t oxidise on the skin  Sweat and humidity-resistant formula doesn’t crease, cake, or fade
Formulated Without:
Oil, Phthalates, Paraben, Retinyl Palmitate, Mineral Oil, Petrolatum, Formaldehyde, Hydroquinone, Triclosan, Coal Tar, Toluene, Lauryl Sulfate, Laureth Sulfate
Usage & Ingredients Directions of Use:
Apply MAC Studio Fix Powder Plus Foundation with the included sponge applicator for more coverage. ;  If using the sponge, make sure to replace it every few weeks and store it in the compartment underneath the powder instead of storing it on top of the powder.  Or, swirl a brush in MAC Studio Fix Powder Plus Foundation. ;  Tap off excess.  Blend on skin until desired coverage is reached.
**Beauty Tip: ;**Try finishing your application with a light veil of Fix+ for a fresh, skin-like glow.
Ingredients:
Talc, Silica, Isostearyl Palmitate, Methicone, Caprylyl Glycol, Hexylene Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, [+/- Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499), Chromium Oxide Greens (Ci 77288), Ultramarines (Ci 77007)] ;ILN29838 ;

PRODUCT DESCRIPTION
Ideal for oily and combination skin, Dior Forever Clean Matte Foundation leaves skin with a flawless, soft-matte finish that keeps oil production at bay. This transfer-proof foundation works to refine pores and perfect skin thanks to nourishing skincare ingredients.
Dior Forever Clean Matte Foundation is a blendable, high-coverage foundation that diminishes the appearance of imperfections. The long-wearing formula reduces the appearance of pores for perfectly smooth, blemish-free skin.

Formulated Without:
Parabens, Phthalates ;
USAGE & INGREDIENTS Directions of Use:
1. Start applying the Dior Forever Clean Matte Foundation by dabbing onto areas that require correction, then blend by smoothing with fingertips. ;
2. For totally even coverage over the entire face, you can use a foundation brush. ;

Category: Health & Beauty, Make Up, Complexion, Foundations
Product Name: VANI-T Skin Perfector HD Serum Foundation F29
Long Description:
If you love liquid foundation but crave some multitasking, skin-perfecting oomph, then the VANI-T Skin Perfector HD Serum Foundation is exactly what your skin ordered.
Skin Perfector HD Serum Foundation instantly gives a smooth, pore-diffusing finish that easily builds to medium to full coverage. Plus, it's chock-full of UV filters, vitamins, and antioxidants galore. These miracle workers combine to soak up excess oils and nasty toxins, helping to improve skin tone, reduce pore size and brighten your skin.
Slippery, greasy and shiny foundation begone! Our matte, oil-free serum foundation is made with climate-adaptive technology that’s resistant to sweat and humidity (it’s designed to play all day), and won’t clog pores (we’ve got you, oily skinned babes). Totally weightless means you won’t even know you’re wearing it, and the flawless finish means neither will anyone else.
Long wearing, buildable coverage and a cake-free, nourished visage. Consider this your daily skin elixir.

Category: Health & Beauty, Make Up, Complexion, Foundations
Product Name: Hanami Vegan, Cruelty Free and 10 Free Nail Polish - Octopus's Garden 15 ml
Long Description:
So why not show yours some love by treating your nails to a coat or two (or three if you just cannot stop yourself) of this super smooth, non chipping vegan and natural nail polish. Even the nail polish brush is vegan. Oh, and did we mention its free from the nasty chemicals most varnishes are made from? Ten Free Breathable & Water Permeable Formula means: free from DBP, toluene, formaldehyde, formaldehyde resin, camphor, parabens, xylene, ethyl tosylamide, fragrances and animal ingredients. Hanami also have also got rid of benzophenone-1 and styrene from their formula - way less chemicals and so much better for you than commercial nail polish!
Key Features
Vegan  Cruelty free  PETA certified  Australian made
Usage
To get the most out of Hanami 10 free nail polish, it's important to always start your manicure with clean nailsGive each nail a gentle wipe with nail polish remover to remove any dirt or oilSweep the brush over each fingernail from base to tip, allow to dryApply over second coat of color for a long wearing, chip-resistant finishFor a longer wearing, chip resistant finish, seal with either Hanami Top & Base Coat or Matte Top CoatIngredients
Ethyl Acetate, Butyl Acetate, Nitrocellulose, Adipic Acid/Neopentyl Glycol/TrimellItic Anhydride Copolymer, Acetyl Tributyl Citrate, Isopropyl Alcohol, Trimethyl siloxysilicate, Stearalkonium Bentonite, N-Butyl Alcohol, Acrylates Copolymer, Polyvinyl Butyral, Trimethyl Pentanediyl Dibenzoate, Mica (CI77019), Polyethylene Terephthalate. May Contain +/-: CI 15850 Red 7 Lake, CI 15850 Red 6 Lake, CI 77499 Black Iron Oxide, CI 77891 Titanium Dioxide, CI 15880 Red 34 Lake, CI 77163 Bismuth Oxychloride, CI 77491 Iron Oxide, CI 77510 Ferric Ferrocyanide, CI 19140 Yellow 5 Lake, CI 45380 Red 22, CI 60725 Violet 2, CI 47005 Yellow 10, CI 47000 Yellow 11, CI 77000 Aluminium Powder, CI 42090 Blue 1, CI 77007 Ultramarine Blue, CI 60730 Violet 2 EXT, CI 45410 Red 28, Silica.

Category: Health & Beauty, Make Up, Complexion, Foundations
Product Name: M.A.C Studio Fix Fluid SPF15 Foundation 30ml - NC45.5
Long Description:
Product Description
24-hour colour-true foundation in a wide range of shades. Buildable, medium to full coverage in a natural matte finish that won’t cake, crease or settle into fine lines or pores. MAC Studio Fix Fluid SPF15 Foundation is a lightweight, oil-free formula that provides all-day hydration and won’t cause breakouts. For ALL skin types.
This cult-favourite foundation from MAC is oil-free and won’t clog pores, perfect for all skin types - even acne-prone skin. MAC Studio Fix Fluid SPF15 Foundation won’t cake or crease on skin, and is sweat and humidity resistant for a long-lasting makeup look. ;
Product Highlights:
SPF 15 for protection from harmful UV rays  Infuses skin with all-day hydration without adding shine  Minimises the look of pores
Formulated Without:
Oil, Phthalates, Paraben, Retinyl Palmitate, Mineral Oil, Petrolatum, Formaldehyde
Hydroquinone, Triclosan, Coal Tar, Toluene, Lauryl Sulfate, Laureth Sulfate
Usage & Ingredients Directions of Use:
Apply MAC Studio Fix Fluid SPF15 Foundation to the centre of the face first (or wherever you want more coverage), then use a brush to blend to the outer regions of your face.
Beauty Tip:  Try mixing MAC Studio Fix Fluid with your favourite moisturiser or oils to create a more sheer, luminous finish.
Ingredients:
Active Ingredients: Octinoxate 2.50%, Titanium Dioxide 1.00%
Ingredients: Water\Aqua\Eau, Cyclopentasiloxane, Peg-10 Dimethicone, Butylene Glycol, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Dimethicone, Magnesium Sulfate, Laminaria Saccharina Extract, Algae Extract, Tocopheryl Acetate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Tocopherol, Lecithin, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Xanthan Gum, Sorbitan Sesquioleate, Methoxy Amodimethicone/Silsesquioxane Copolymer, Laureth-7, Dipropylene Glycol,
